data.text: @pauleddison @StephenWall1985 It's a strategy that cannot currently be faulted. And not just on paper. I've always been impressed with his dynamism, assurance and in particular his accuracy since he's been our finisher 9.
@JulesArk @StephenWall1985 He only made his debut in the autumn and they last lost on the summer tour, so no!
@StephenWall1985 @pauleddison Has France ever lost a game where Lucu has come on as a finisher? I wanna say no.
@Polo_VB @pauleddison In 3 match he will have been center, left winger and now right winger. The man is everywhere.
@StephenWall1985 @pauleddison Well anything I showed you was entirely by accident 😂 Confess I'm not fluent in "finishers" and "players traveling with the squad".

@LeFidjienBlanc @StephenWall1985 @pauleddison They could have called a center like Vakatawa...
Also missing physicality on the bench without Tao
@StephenWall1985 @pauleddison I don't get the purpose of Lebel on the bench. He's not in form and he's a finisher, it does not bring any physical impact as most wingers coming from the bench

@JulesArk @pauleddison Ah, now that you put it like that I see my own mistake.

You always have to have 3 Tight-Heads. So with the risk of Covid, they bring a fourth. Sorry, of course.

@StephenWall1985 @pauleddison Not sure, but is yr pt that they shouldn't travel, or that someone else should? Is it a Covid risk to travel? Or if they don't travel, does that mean they can't play (I assume it does). I can see how tight head is a position you can't afford to not fill. Anyone can play centre.

@JulesArk @pauleddison One thing I don’t understand: if (presumably) further Covid cases are possible now, why take 2 Tight-Head Props in the 5 travelling players (Bamba & Falatea) who aren’t part of the 23?
